CustomField.formula: IF( OR( CONTAINS(Account.OEM_Account__r.Name,"Acquia"), CONTAINS(Account.OEM_Account__r.Name,"Workfront"), Account.OEM_Account__r.Account_ID_18_digits__c = $Label.AWS_OEM_Account_ID ) && NOT(CONTAINS(Account.OEM_Account__r.Name, "Non OEM")), Account.OEM_Account__r.BillingCountry, Account.BillingCountry)
CustomField.label: Billing Country
